name: Block Sniper Hunter Crime 2
description:
Block Sniper Hunter Crime 2 is the most popular 3D pixel style gun shooter game with block style weapons, armors, characters and battlegrounds. Deal with your foes using an arsenal of intense weaponry. The pistol comes in handy when dispatching single enemies, while the assault rifle allows you to quickly take down multiple foes.
Features:
- Intense, immersive real-time FPS action
- Awesome tactical movement system with console-like shooting experience
- Different real-world guns to choose fro
- Addictive multiplayer gameplay
- Leap over the heads of your adversaries in space mode.
- Varied and realistic scenarios.
